0.5.1.name: wordpress/last-updated-posts-widget
0.5.1.description:
THIS PLUGIN IS NOT SUPPORTED AT THE MOMENT

When you update/modify one of your posts on your Wordpress blog and you want your visitors to know about it, this is what you need. This widget plugin create a sidebar box with a list of posts you've recently updated/modified. You can choose to display the date of the update beside the page title in the format you prefer.

Have fun!
